previewArticle.title: Ghana vs. USA: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group G Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Ghana 1, USA 2: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group G Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Mooch
timelineItems.text: If USA wins the World Cup, I'll get a tattoo of Michael Bradley's bald head. #USMNT �������

timelineItems.name: Russel Carey
timelineItems.text: I'm still shaking lol #USMNT #OneNationOneTeam #1N1T #USA #USAvGHA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ghana. Sulley Ali Muntari tries a through ball, but Asamoah Gyan is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Nithin Krishnan
timelineItems.text: #USMNT didn't score first in 4 games in 2010. Welcome change :) #USA #USA #USMNT #1N1T

timelineItems.text: If I weren't already happily married I might propose to @TimHowardGK for a save like that. #USAvGHA #USMNT #WorldCup2014

Foul by Alejandro Bedoya (USA).

timelineItems.name: Drew Burns
timelineItems.text: It's 12:16 a.m. in Paris. Am I watching the #USMNT on vacation? You're damn right I am. #USAvGHA

timelineItems.name: Chad Johnson

timelineItems.text: Hell yeah Dempsey!!! USA USA USA #Brasil2014 #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Bananas

timelineItems.name: Ryan Rogahn
timelineItems.text: What a game! I believe that we will win! #USMNT ���

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: There have been three scoreless first halves at this #WorldCup. Mexico has played two of them.

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 1978 12%, 1994 11%, 1990 11%, 1998 10%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 13% - A higher % of goals have been scored from penalties at 2014 #WorldCup than any other finals - 78 12%, 94 11%, 90 11%. Spot @MacRob85

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Busy #WorldCup day ahead: Netherlands & Chile could advance. Spain (!) is 1 of 4 teams that could be eliminated.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Brazil had been 17-0-0 at the #WorldCup vs non-UEFA/CONMEBOL teams, outscoring them 50-5.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Today's #WorldCup coverage: AUS-NED: 11:30 AM ET, ESPN ESP-CHI, 2:30 ET, ESPN CMR-CRO, 5:30 ET, ESPN

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 7 - Arjen Robben has scored seven goals in his last seven appearances for #NED. Threat. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 11 - #NED are unbeaten in their last 11 #WorldCup group stage matches, winning eight and drawing three. Juggernaut.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Tim Cahill has five career #WorldCup goals. All other Australians have a total of five.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: 49 goals so far at the World Cup, most through 17 #WorldCup games since 1958.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Arjen Robben now has six career #WorldCup goals. Johnny Rep is the only Dutchman with more (7).

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: FIFA now clocks Clint Dempsey's goal at 30 seconds, still the 5th-fastest goal in #WorldCup history.

timelineItems.name: Univision Noticias
timelineItems.text: Presidente Obama le envía mensaje al #TeamUSA antes del partido → https://t.co/JLIZL0WE5K #GoTeamUSA #USAvGHA #WorldCup #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Jake White
timelineItems.text: The equalizer appears inevitable. #GHAvUSA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Tullock
timelineItems.text: Getting frightening... #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Cory Faust Sr
timelineItems.text: Alright America, let's get behind our #USMNT and watch them overcome a very skilled and talented #BlackStars team #USAvsGhana #IBELIEVE

timelineItems.name: Glenn Dayoan
timelineItems.text: RT @Cardinals: The #STLCards stand behind @ussoccer and #USMNT today for their #WorldCup match against ... http://t.co/9PxkW7c81c

timelineItems.name: regularguy
timelineItems.text: The wings have been heated up. The beer has been poured. The family has been warned about the yelling. It's gametime! #USMNT #IBelieve

timelineItems.name: Christopher McKenzie
timelineItems.text: I said when this group came out that #USMNT would beat Ghana and Portugal, and I'm sticking by what I've said

timelineItems.name: Evan Gallagher
timelineItems.text: Feeling real patriotic. Got my Dempsey shirt on ready to watch #USMNT get their first win in Brazil. #USAUSAUSA

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: This is your moment. Seize it. The whole country is behind you. @ussoccer #USMNT #OneNationOneTeam #USA #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Gilly
timelineItems.text: I suspect the US is a team that will sing their anthem. Hands on their hearts? #GHAvUSA

timelineItems.name: John Hinnant
timelineItems.text: Thanks Coach. Thanks for singing our National Anthem. #1N1T #USMNT #TeamUSA #AmericanOutlaws

timelineItems.name: Ryan Fritzberg
timelineItems.text: Goosebumps! #GoGoUSA #IBelieve #USMNT

timelineItems.desc:
Former USA and Egypt head coach, Bob Bradley, shares his insights after playing Ghana in 2010 and World Cup Qualifying.  Find out where the Staebek manager thinks Ghana is strong and where the US can exploit.

For more World Cup coverage: http://www.mlssoccer.com/WorldCup

Brazil Bound Giveaway rules:
http://www.mlssoccer.com/brazilboundgiveawayrules
timelineItems.title: Ghana scouting report with former US Coach Bob Bradley | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.name: Kyle Scarbro
timelineItems.text: #1n1t #usmnt #USAvsGHA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Daniel Opare (Ghana).
DaMarcus Beasley (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.text: He does. We do. Let's go: http://t.co/xJAwpK430i #GHAvUSA #1N1T http://t.co/OlHjM1aYAN

timelineItems.text: He does. We do. Let's go: http://t.co/xJAwpK430i #GHAvUSA #1N1T http://t.co/OlHjM1aYAN

timelineItems.name: Michael Pajak
timelineItems.text: In Timmy we trust! #USMNT #1N1T

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: That moment when the ball hits the back of the net. #GHAvUSA http://t.co/vDDytxd7lz

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: That moment when the ball hits the back of the net. #GHAvUSA http://t.co/vDDytxd7lz

timelineItems.name: Kyle Weidleman
timelineItems.text: No no no no no no no… RT @noboa: KP Boateng on. Things preparing to go from bad to worse for the #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Bryan Parker
timelineItems.text: Howard is basically saying "You shall Not Pass" #USMNT #USAvGHA #1N1T

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Christian Atsu (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kwadwo Asamoah.
Fabian Johnson (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by André Ayew (Ghana).

timelineItems.name: DJ Meeks
timelineItems.text: Ghana pressuring the ball, giving no space whatsoever. Bradley also having the worst game I’ve ever seen him have. But Howard tho.. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (USA) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: Chase Lubbers
timelineItems.text: As a Chelsea fan I am 110% behind the #USMNT parking the bus. Go forth and park with zero weight on your conscious!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kevin-Prince Boateng (Ghana) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Sulley Ali Muntari with a cross following a corner.
Attempt blocked. Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin-Prince Boateng with a cross.
Corner,  Ghana. Conceded by Geoff Cameron.

timelineItems.name: Matt Flood
timelineItems.text: Geoff Cameron is man of the match so far. Very solid in the back #GHAvUSA

timelineItems.name: Conner
timelineItems.text: Got to love Tim Howard!! #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jermaine Jones (USA).
Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Kwadwo Asamoah (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sulley Ali Muntari.

timelineItems.name: Brian Sciaretta
timelineItems.text: How on earth does the #USMNT hang onto this?

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Craig Newman
timelineItems.text: Dodging some bullets right now. Can't keep this up. Need one more. #USMNT #IBelieveThatWeWillWin

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kevin-Prince Boateng (Ghana) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Thompson
timelineItems.text: I wish #USMNT would not just pack it in and play not to lose. I guess Klinsmann knows more than me. #WorldCup2014 #USAvsGHA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Jonathan Mensah.
Foul by DaMarcus Beasley (USA).
Christian Atsu (Ghana) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Jozy Altidore (USA) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Alejandro Bedoya with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Alex Branscome
timelineItems.text: At work. All work stopped for the National Anthem #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Conrado Morlan
timelineItems.text: Capitán América #DEUCE #DEMPSEY #WeGhanaWin #1N1T #StarsandStripes #USA #RedWhiteandBlue #BRAZIL2014 #BRASIL

timelineItems.name: Jon Ball
timelineItems.text: Bradley has been a disaster in the midfield so far. Hope we can hang onto this! #USMNT #GoUSASoccer #WorldCup2014 #USAvsGhana

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: No let down. #GHAvUSA #1N1T http://t.co/UF9oh6Yhwd

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: No let down. #GHAvUSA #1N1T http://t.co/UF9oh6Yhwd

timelineItems.name: Deviö
timelineItems.text: Bradley should have been there on that back post to score there #usmnt #ibelievethatwewillwin

timelineItems.name: Shawn Jacob
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones making the small plays the big plays. #GHAvsUSA #USMNT #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jordan Molnar
timelineItems.text: Im not going to complain about Jermaine Jones playing again. He is everywhere doing everything for this team. #USMNT #USAvsGhana #USA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ghana. Daniel Opare tries a through ball, but Kevin-Prince Boateng is caught offside.
Corner,  Ghana. Conceded by Alejandro Bedoya.

timelineItems.name: Dan Maciejewski
timelineItems.text: This must be what it's like to be a Stoke supporter. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Xcrossbones
timelineItems.text: US team looking slower and slower. No Offense #USAvGHA #USMNT #OneNationOneTeam

timelineItems.name: David Strickland
timelineItems.text: ESPN reports @JozyAltidore will undergo scans tomorrow to determine extent of hamstring injury. @abc13houston #HouNews #WorldCup2014 #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Ghana. Sulley Ali Muntari tries a through ball, but Kevin-Prince Boateng is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Brewtown Andy
timelineItems.text: SAINT ZUSI #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. André Ayew (Ghana) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kwadwo Asamoah with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Kasey Espinoza
timelineItems.text: USA stop this now!!! Please stop making me nervous!!!! #USMNT #IBelieveThatWeWillWin

timelineItems.name: Sean Orleans
timelineItems.text: Bradley is in for the duration. Hold onto yer butts. #USvsGhana #USMNT

timelineItems.name: J
timelineItems.text: Let me breath easy boys, give me one more goal. #USA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Fabian Johnson.

timelineItems.name: Kody Grove
timelineItems.text: I don't know what looked better, the footwork to beat the last defender or that beautiful goal. #USMNT @ussoccer

timelineItems.name: Matt
timelineItems.text: Zusi lived in college park. I helped pay his scholarship. I'm a fan. It's why I moved to CP. Get it Zusi. #soamped #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Daniel Opare (Ghana).
Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: catie
timelineItems.text: CAN NO ONE TAKE A DAMN SHOT?! #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Keith Leventhal
timelineItems.text: If the heat and humidity are getting to these players now, just wait until 2022 when a "cool" day will be 110 degrees. #USMNT #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Travis Cunningham
timelineItems.text: Well crap. #USMNT #USAvsGhana

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: It was coming #USMNT #GHAvsUSA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're level. #GHAvUSA

timelineItems.name: Grant Wahl
timelineItems.text: GHANA GOAL—Andre Ayew knifes through the U.S. defense and scores the equalizer. Excruciating near-post finish. US on the ropes here. 1-1.

timelineItems.name: Todd Wuest
timelineItems.text: Justice served. You defend for that long and eventually you crack. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: LowKey
timelineItems.text: Come on #USMNT just push thru it and get another goal.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  USA. Conceded by Jonathan Mensah.

timelineItems.name: Sports Talk Florida
timelineItems.text: No way to sugarcoat it: the #USMNT need a win if they're going to escape the "Group of Death."

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: BRROOOOOKSIE! #USMNT #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: John Fischer
timelineItems.text: JOHN ANTHONY BROOKS. 2-1 #USMNT HOLD THE DAMN LINE

timelineItems.name: Dan Harland
timelineItems.text: Wow. Victory from the grasp of a draw. Where did that come from?!?! #USMNT

timelineItems.name: CK
timelineItems.text: Nothing more American than that. #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kevin-Prince Boateng (Ghana) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Albert Adomah with a cross.
Corner,  Ghana. Conceded by John Anthony Brooks.
Attempt blocked. Michael Essien (Ghana) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sulley Ali Muntari with a cross.
Attempt missed. Jonathan Mensah (Ghana) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Bradley Wallace
timelineItems.text: 2-1!! #USA #IBelieve #USMNT

timelineItems.text: The emotion of an entire country captured in one image. #GHAvUSA http://t.co/uGrq7Smmbf

timelineItems.name: Brandon Barelmann
timelineItems.text: BROOOOOKS!!!!!!!!!!!! @ussoccer #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Brick Tamland
timelineItems.text: Yes yes yes yes!!!! Brooks!!!! We take the lead!!!! MURICA!!!! #worldcup #2014wc #2014brazil  #us #usa #usmnt

timelineItems.name: Ryan McCauley
timelineItems.text: if #usmnt is gonna make a lot of noise in this tourny, we are certainly gonna need huge games from @TimHowardGK

Jermaine Jones (USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: HoM Burger Boutique
timelineItems.text: Who's heart is racing!? #USA #wecan #wewill #worldcup #USMNT @ Hom Charleston http://t.co/IB4CrvmZXg

timelineItems.name: Scott Kennedy
timelineItems.text: Yeah that soccer stuff is boring #worldcup #usagha #usmnt

timelineItems.comment: Clint Dempsey (USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana).

timelineItems.name: Kevin Branch
timelineItems.text: Give Zusi a lot of credit for delivering a perfect ball on that corner. Perfect. #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Shelby Ahart
timelineItems.text: I get home from class. and turn on the #USAvGHA game to see @j_brooks25 score to put @ussoccer and #USMNT ahead! #OneNationOneTeam

timelineItems.name: Maxwell Partain
timelineItems.text: Perfect reaction. You can't beat this. You can't stop US. #usmnt #fanhq #goal

timelineItems.name: KEVINHO
timelineItems.text: WHAT A GAME #USMNT #IBelieveThatWeWillWin #USA

timelineItems.name: The Addy
timelineItems.text: 5 minutes? Whatever. Let's use it to score 5 goals. #Merica #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Michelle Brueggeman
timelineItems.text: Jesus @clint_dempsey is taking a beating tonight! #USAvGHA #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Sulley Ali Muntari (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Binnie
timelineItems.text: #USMNT showing great heart to get back into it!!!!!

timelineItems.name: Joshua Hixenbaugh
timelineItems.text: Longest 5 minutes ever #USAvsGhana #USAvGHA #USMNT

timelineItems.name: Luis M.™
timelineItems.text: Vengeance is the sweetest thing in life! 3rd times the charm the #USMNT!

timelineItems.name: Vicky M
timelineItems.text: #USMNT is trying to kill me. Don't know what I ever did to them, but I'm really sorry. #OneNationOneTeam

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Ghana 1, USA 2.

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com brings you Brazil Bound from New York City Live! 31 Hours before the US Men take on Ghana. Former US Men's coach Jesse Marsch will be sitting down with Jason Saghini, Simon Borg, and Greg Lalas to talk about all things US Men's National Team Soccer and World Cup. The show kicks off at 11am ET. 

Use #BrazilBound to join the conversation and win cool Castrol swag!
timelineItems.title: USMNT vs Ghana 31 Hour Tailgate Extravaganza | Brazil Bound
